snippet.title: Loopz gameplay (PC Game, 1990)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Loopz, Dos PC game produced by Audiogenic in 1990 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/loopz/7036/
Loopz is an interesting, puzzle game where the main goal is to make loops. The game idea is simple, place random pieces on the grid to build LOOPS.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Russian 6 Pack - https://youtu.be/yergSkyASwE
Lose Your Marbles - https://youtu.be/PcjQ27_yZJ8
Pipe Dreams - https://youtu.be/Z2jBf3NAUGI
